column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column7: hom mpaa mu dɛ ɔyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no
column8: mekyerɛ iyinom nye m'afahyɛ a mahyehyɛ."

column2: "Nda esia na wɔnyɛ edwuma: na da a otsia esuon no yɛ ahomgye mu ahomgyeda
column3: nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn a; mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara: ɔyɛ ahomgyeda ma EWURADZE wɔ hom tsenabew nyina."

column2: "Iyinom nye EWURADZE n'afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ
column3: mekyerɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn a hom mpaa wɔ ne mber a wɔahyɛ mu no."

column2: "Bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia duanan no n'ewimbir no yɛ EWURADZE apaho."
"Na bosoom no ara mu da a otsia duenum no yɛ EWURADZE epitsi afahyɛ: nda esuon na hom ndzi epitsi."
"Da a odzi kan no nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn: mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara."
"Mbom hom mbɔ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE nda esuon: da a otsia esuon no yɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ hom du asaase a medze rema hom no do
column7: na wotwa no do ndɔbaa a
column8: ɔno hom mfa hom ndɔbaa mu nduadzewakan no ifi mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no:"

column2: "na ɔntow ifi no wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: ma ɔnsɔ enyi mma hom: ahomgyeda no n'adzekyee na ɔsɔfo no ntow."

column2: "Na da a hom tow ifi no
column3: hom mfa eguambaanyin a onndzii dzɛm a oedzi afrenhyia mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na no ho edziban afɔr nyɛ isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column3: ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE: na no ho nom afɔr nyɛ wenyin

column2: "Na mma hom nndzi boodoo
column3: anaa eburow totoe
column5: kɛpem dɛ hom dze hom Nyankopɔn ayɛyɛdze no bɛba ana: ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu wɔ hom tsenabew nyinara mu."

column2: "Na hom mfitsi ahomgyeda no n'adzekyee nkan nda
column3: mfa mfi da a hom dze ɔtow afɔr ifi baa no do; ma ahomgyeda esuon nwie du:"

column2: "hom nkan adaduenum ma onkesi ahomgyeda a otsia esuon no n'adzekyee; na hom mfa edziban afɔr fofor mbrɛ EWURADZE."
"Hom mfa efa ( efah ) ebupɛn du mu ebien nyɛ ntɔwntɔwmu mfi hom tsenabew mbra: ɔnyɛ isiam pa
column3: wɔmfa mbɔrkaw nto

column2: "Na hom mfa nguambaa esuon a wonndzii dzɛm a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia
column3: nye ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: nye nguannyin ebien nka boodoo no ho mbra: wɔnyɛ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE
column7: mekyerɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na hom mfa apɔnkyenyin kor mbɔ ho afɔr
column3: nye nguambaanyin ebien a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia mbɔ asomdwee afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no ntow hɔn nye nduadzewakan boodoo no nyɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: nka nguambaa ebien no ho: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma EWURADZE mfa mma ɔsɔfo no."

column2: "Na hom mbɔ dawur da no ara; ɔnyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn mma hom: mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara: ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom tsenabew nyinara mu wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu."
"Na sɛ hom twa hom asaase do ndɔbaa a
column3: mma nntwa hanoa dze no korakora
column4: nkyii so mma nndzi wo ndɔbaa no mpɛpɛw: gya no hɔ fa ma ohianyi
column5: nye ɔhɔho: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: Bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a odzi kan no
column6: nyɛ ahomgye pa mma hom; wɔnhɛn totorobɛnto nyɛ nkaa

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara: na hom mbɔ ogya afɔr
column3: mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Naaso bosoom a otsia esuon yi ara ne da a otsia du no nye mpata da: ɔnyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn mma hom
column5: na hom mbrɛ homho adze; na hom mbɔ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ no ara mu: na ɔyɛ mpata da
column3: ma wɔaapata ama hom wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔnnkɛbrɛ noho adze da no ara mu no
column3: wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔyɛ edwuma biara wɔ dɛm da no ara mu no
column3: wɔbɛsɛɛ no efi ne man mu."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara: ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu wɔ hom tsenabew nyinara."
"Ɔnyɛ ahomgye pa mu ahomgyeda mma hom
column3: na hom mbrɛ hom akra adze: bosoom no ne da a otsia akron no n'ewimbir
column5: na hom ndzi hom ahomgyeda no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: Bosoom a otsia esuon no yi ara ne da a otsia duenum no ɔyɛ ntamadan afahyɛ nda esuon ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Da a odzi kan no yɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn: mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara."
"Nda esuon na hom mbɔ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE: da a otsia awɔtwe no nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn mma hom; na hom mbɔ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE: ɔyɛ nguabɔ ewiei; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara."
"Iyinom nye EWURADZE n'afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ a hom mpaa mu dɛ ɔyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no
column3: ma wɔmfa ogya afɔr mbrɛ EWURADZE
column8: kor wɔ nankasa ne da mu:"

column2: "ɔsor EWURADZE n'ahomgyeda no
column3: na ɔsor hom ayɛyɛdze
column5: na ɔsor hom ayamuyi afɔr nyinara a hom dze ma EWURADZE no."

column2: "Naaso bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a otsia duenum no mu
column3: sɛ hom roboaboa asaase no do nduadzewa ano a
column4: hom nhyɛ EWURADZE fa no nda esuon: da a odzi kan no nyɛ ahomgye pa
column5: na da a otsia awɔtwe no nyɛ ahomgye pa."

column2: "Na da a odzi kan no hom mfa ndua fɛɛfɛw do nduadzewa
column3: nye menankɔnson
column5: nye esukɔn do ndua; na hom enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim nda esuon."

column2: "Na hom nhyɛ no fa mma EWURADZE nda esuon wɔ afrenhyia mu: ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu: bosoom a otsia esuon no mu na hom nhyɛ."
"Hom ntsenatsena asese mu nda esuon; hɔn a wɔyɛ amamba wɔ Israel nyinara ntsenatsena asese mu:"
"ama hom ebusuasantsen eehu dɛ emi na memaa Israelmba tsenatsenaa asese mu wɔ aber a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do no: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
"Na Moses kaa EWURADZE n'afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ no kyerɛɛ Israelmba."
